name: Nite City Boba Run
description: You play as a delivery person for Bonba’s Boba (BB’s) , a boba shop who’s boba shaking machine has unfortunately broken. While repairs to the machine are underway the delivery staff at BB’s have been asked to deliver the boba to the customer while also shaking it up the best they can. Race against the clock in Nite City racking up as many points as possible before time runs out.
